text: Uzoba bona bajanwa mumuriro udahera nabo baboneka yuko bafise amaganya hamwe n’ibimara mare vyinshi kandi barabana kubandi nabo bihishije, nayo abameye Imana yabo y’ukuri bazovuga bati:- mu vy’ukuri abazoronka uruhombo ni muri barya bazoba bafise uruhombo rw’imitima yabo hamwe n’abantu babo, hanyuma kuri uwo musi w’imperuka ntankeka abahemukiye imitima yabo bazoba bari mubihano vyurutavana ko
